vclaim: A fungus called Massospora cicadina could infect Brood X cicadas as they were set to emerge in May 2021. It's a “death-zombie fungus” that could potentially wreak havoc on the species.
title: Could Fungus ‘Full of Psychedelic Drugs’ Cause Brood X Cicadas Butts to Fall Off?
subtitle: The fungus has been compared to a sexually transmitted disease for an insect.
author: Madison Dapcevich
